body.name: KidKraft Reversible Wooden Activity Table with Board with 195 Building Bricks – Gray & Natural, Gift for Ages 3+
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 9 hrs 28 mins
features: MADE OF WOOD: Crafted of long-lasting, premium and sustainable materials for a durable toy that can be passed down from kid to kid. Natural finish is a nice neutral color to fit in with your home's décor.
DOUBLE SIDED: Tabletop is either a building bricks surface for constructing or a smooth wood surface for free play with cars, dolls or more.
INCLUDES BRICKS: Give this wooden activity table as a gift and play can start right away, thanks to the inclusion of 195 colorful building bricks.
EASY-LIFT LID: Cutout notches on the lid make it easy for little hands to lift and remove without fear of being pinched. Rounded corners also make for safer play.
HIDDEN STORAGE: Sweep all building bricks, play cars and more underneath the lid for the easiest cleanup around. Keeps everything neat and tidy till next play time.
body.description: Who knows what creations the KidKraft Activity Table will inspire? The reversible table top features a smooth play surface on one side, and a building brick surface on the other. It includes almost 200 building bricks to get little engineers started on their first creations. When playtime is done, the table top lifts to reveal a storage area underneath. This versatile table is carefully constructed with rounded corners for years of safe, imaginative fun.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 4,962 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing product and am so glad that I got it for my son. It allows for him to store his playdoh as well as his legos while also having a place to build and play. Assembling was quick and easy. It is also very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great little lego table.
reviews.reviewText: this Lego table is sturdy and the storage area is great. no more Legos scattered around the floor. my grandson plays Legos on it often. I thought the price was a little high but when I saw it together I didn't mind so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size table!
reviews.reviewText: This table is a great size and sturdy. Highly recommend for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Students love these
reviews.reviewText: This table was easily assembled, the table itself is holding up well and it holds a lot of blocks. Sadly though the lid is not as sturdy nor is the pieces that hold the lid level. I will take time this summer after school to shore up the lid with 1/4 inch or 1/8 plywood and use wood blocks for the lid to be level. It would be great for one child as long as they did not attempt to sit on the top. For a classroom of children though it isn't quite as strong as it should be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, well made and securely packed table which was easy to assemble in under 15 minutes by my husband. I had no problem with the pre-placed 4 gray block mats on the block side of the table. They were glued on securely and all 4 mats lined up perfectly. No problem using Mega, Duplo, Lego, or the small blocks that came with the table. They all fit securely, even over seams where the mats joined. I purchased it for my 14 mo old grandson who can stand at the table to play. The table is meant for kids to use while sitting on the floor, kneeling, or standing. It is not tall enough to use with a kid size chair. There is ample 3” deep storage space under the table top that lifts off to loosely store blocks and/or arts and crafts materials. There is also a depression on either side of the table for a little hand to reach in to grab blocks. The table is not made to hold sand or water. The table top consists of a block side and a smooth wooden side for arts/crafts, pretend play, drawing/painting/coloring, etc and it is easy to clean. It is a great table and I would buy and/or gift this table again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son loves legos but had no where to put them. My mom bought this for Christmas and he flipped out. These legos do NOT come with it but it DOES come with its own. Table is easy to put together and has room to store some on the inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the idea of the two sided top but it's hard to flip, the board isn't flat, the Lego mats are peeling off from the middle, and the corners are very sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought two for my 12 and 5 year olds…
reviews.reviewText: These are sturdy they have four either 10 x 10 or 12 x 12 square plates that lift up and have holes for your fingers to place through to make moving the top easy… there is ample room inside for many mini Legos… both of my kids love them… and there is a lot of space to build multiple packages of Legos and keep the “neighborhoods” or “Minecraft” villages up while playing with mini figures…. My kids love them… I may repurchase for nieces and nephew… the cost is appropriate easy to put together with a few screws. Everything came with the package as well as a few mini figures and a bag of Legos to get started….

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for my kid and easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: This desk is great for toddlers. My son took to it right away and the lid is double sided. One flat and one with a Lego plate so they can build right onto the desk. Took less than 10 mins to put together also.

Los legos alimentan mucho la imaginación y esta mesa además de servir para guardar, tambien ayuda a que los niños tengan mejor soporte para hacer sus creaciones.Tiene altura buena para un niño de 3 a 5 años esté levantado y de 6 a 10 estén sentados.Se ve duradera y todo se acopla correctamente.
The lego panels glues to the top are pealing in the corners but otherwise this a good table for the kids.

Functionally works fine. It's a good size and height however the quality of the construction is quite a bit short of what I was expecting. Based on the photos I thought it was plywood construction but it is actually made of particleboard. It also came with a few cosmetic defects.

El producto llegó a tiempo y bien empacado. Me encanto que lo arme en menos de 5 minutos, es bastante resistente, lo tengo en mi consultorio y todo el día juegan niños con él y se ve como nuevo. Las piezas que trae algunas no embonan bien pero es lo de menos. En general muy bueno!!!
